name: Bet on Soldier: Blood of Sahara
name_original: Bet on Soldier: Blood of Sahara
description:
Bet on Soldier: Blood of Sahara is an action-shooter game developed by Kylotonn Entertainment. It was originally released in 2006. It was published by Frogster Interactive Pictures. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
You can play Bet on Soldier: Blood of Sahara on PC.
